span.strong: Click here to learn how to use Teams

span.span: Please notice the new tabs above which allow direct access to email, Microsoft Teams and our Remote Learning/Blizzard Bag site. Also above is a link for a tutorial on how to access and use Microsoft Teams.
At this time, by order of the Governor, Fairlawn will be closed through Friday, May 1st.

font.span: Our cheerleaders are holding their annual detergent fundraiser. Look below for more information!
Here is a link to a great website containing numerous educational and family fun links that you can use with your children during the stay at home order:

span.span: All core HS/MS classes will have online meeting times throughout the week. This gives time for additional instruction as well as time for students to ask questions. The weekly online meeting times are posted below:

As we move forward with remote learning for our students we are ready to expand our offerings for our students beginning with Monday, April 6th. Please click on the links below to get specific information on how your students will access their lessons and assignments:

With the shutdown of schools and businesses there is a lot going on in the world that can lead to anxiety in both students and adults, here are some resources for families to use to help cope with anxiety and depression:
The Tri-County Board of Recovery and Mental Health Services has a 24 hour crisis line 1-800-351-7347. Families can also access that service by texting 4hope to 741 741.

If you go to the tri county board’s website https://www.tcbmds.org/ about half way down on the main page there is info on COVID19, tips on maintaining good mental health during this time, a fact sheet and a free online screener for those experiencing depression, anxiety or stress related to COVID19.

The school office will have limited hours and be open from 8am until noon on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. You are encouraged to contact your teacher directly by email if you have questions about a lesson.
Please check the counseling page for updates - CCP, scheduling, elementary lessons/activities, etc. Please email Ms. Gernert with any questions and/or concerns.
Click Here to be directed to the website for the Imagination Library. Your child can receive a new book every month from birth to age 5.
As additional information becomes available, we will continue to update this website!

div.span: Support the Fairlawn Cheerleaders with their annual detergent fundraiser. Click Here for an order form.

Check out the Fairlawn YouTube channel to find videos the teachers are making to stay engaged with students!
